title: About
text:
Poker Camp is a project by Max Chiswick and Ross Rheingans-Yoo.



Poker Camp


Mission: abc
Max bio: - 2008-2012: Online poker pro mostly on PokerStars - 2017: MSc with thesis on AI poker at Technion Israel Institute of Technology with Nahum Shimkin - 2019 and 2022: Two poker research papers with Sam Ganzfried - Non-poker background on LinkedIn
Ross bio: - https://blog.rossry.net/me/
Contribute: We are in the process of becoming a nonprofit. If you are interested in contributing, please see our .org site: https://pokercamp.org.

title: Poker Camp
text:
Poker Camp is a program to learn about probability, game theory, AI, and decision making through the lens of poker.
Our first camp will take place from Jul 8 to Aug 8 in person in San Francisco. Click here for the signup form.



Poker Camp


Interested in contributing or want to get in touch? Send a message or sign up for the mailing list.
Note that the programming and related materials/workshops are for educational purposes and will not use any real money.
